summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2008 CAMLINE 5CAM610LPD DUMP TRAILER (NA).  WHILE PARKED UNATTACHED IN THE YARD, THE TRAILER CAUGHT FIRE.  THE TRAILER WAS EMPTY AT THE TIME OF THE FAILURE.  THERE WAS NO PROPERTY DAMAGE.  THE MANUFACTURER COULD NOT DETERMINE WHAT CAUSED THE FIRE.  NO OTHER VEHICLE INFORMATION WAS AVAILABLE.  UPDATED 01/09/08.  *LJ  THE CONSUMER STATED AFTER THE DEALER REPAIRED THE TRAILER, THERE WAS YET AGAIN ANOTHER FAILURE. THE CONSUMER STATED IT APPEARS THE DEALER PUT IN THE WRONG SIZE BATTERY. UPDATED 12/12/07  *TR
